name: Black Jack
overview: Black Jack is a Game & Watch game released as part of the Multi-Screen series on February 15, 1985. It is a vertical multi-screen single-player Game & Watch. Black Jack was the last Game & Watch video game to be released in Japan. All games released after Black Jack were released only in other countries, despite being made in Japan. In Game A, play Blackjack against the computer dealer according to the usual rules. The dealer gives you the cards and you make your bet using the buttons. The maximum displayed score is $9,999. GAME B is a number matching game in which you have to form profitable combinations of numbers as quickly as possible.
